answer: 1. Semantic Scholar (Free) 2. Litmaps (Free) 3. SciSpace (Free with limitations) 4. Elicit (Free) 5. Avidnote (Free) 6. JQuery (Free) 7. AI Blaze (Free) 8. MyStylus (Free) 9. ground_truth: 15+ Best AI Tools for Academic Research (Free+Paid) 2025
